issues.description: Template’s Farm.java defines a private no-argument constructor, preventing instantiation with new Farm() even though the problem statement and solution both require a public no-argument constructor to initialize the animal list.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the private constructor in Farm.java to public (public Farm()) and initialize the ArrayList of animals inside it.

issues.description: Template’s singFarmSongVerse method is declared without any parameters (the Animal parameter is commented out), conflicting with the UML in the problem statement and the solution’s signature which expect singFarmSongVerse(Animal animal).
issues.suggested_fix: Uncomment and add the Animal parameter to the method signature: private void singFarmSongVerse(Animal animal).

issues.description: In the UML diagram of the problem statement, addAnimal is marked as private (- addAnimal(animal: Animal): void), but the solution implements addAnimal as public and external code (Main/tests) must call it, so it should be public.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the UML in the problem statement to show addAnimal as a public method (+ addAnimal(animal: Animal): void) to match the intended design and solution implementation.
